text: The friend in my adversity I shall always cherish most. I can better trust those who helped to relieve the gloom of my dark hours than those who are so ready to enjoy with me the sunshine of my prosperity.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_132903

text: In every battle there comes a time when both sides consider themselves beaten, then he who continues the attack wins.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_143688

text: The art of war is simple enough. Find out where your enemy is. Get at him as soon as you can. Strike him as hard as you can, and keep moving on.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_392698

text: My failures have been errors in judgment, not of intent.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_382413

text: I have never advocated war except as a means of peace.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_108434

text: Everyone has his superstitions. One of mine has always been when I started to go anywhere, or to do anything, never to turn back or to stop until the thing intended was accomplished.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_158216

text: I propose to fight it out on this line if it takes all summer.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_383077

text: If men make war in slavish obedience to rules, they will fail.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_138224

text: Hold fast to the Bible. To the influence of this Book we are indebted for all the progress made in true civilization and to this we must look as our guide in the future.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_402264

text: Labor disgraces no man; unfortunately, you occasionally find men who disgrace labor.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_104943

text: Leave the matter of religion to the family altar, the church, and the private school, supported entirely by private contributions. Keep the church and state forever separate.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_134448

text: If you see the President, tell him from me that whatever happens there will be no turning back.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_386369

text: I know only two tunes: one of them is 'Yankee Doodle', and the other isn't.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_101908

text: I have made it a rule of my life to trust a man long after other people gave him up, but I don't see how I can ever trust any human being again.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_110391

text: There never was a time when, in my opinion, some way could not be found to prevent the drawing of the sword.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_133290

text: I suffer the mortification of seeing myself attacked right and left by people at home professing patriotism and love of country who never heard the whistle of a hostile bullet. I pity them and the nation dependent on such for its existence. I am thankful, however that, though such people make a great noise, the masses are not like them.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_821982

text: I know no method to secure the repeal of bad or obnoxious laws so effective as their stringent execution.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_134449

text: No other terms than unconditional and immediate surrender. I propose to move immediately upon your works.
author: Ulysses S. Grant
citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_387100

text: Let us have peace.

citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_377102

text: Nations, like individuals, are punished for their transgressions.

citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_169599

text: It was my fortune, or misfortune, to be called to the office of Chief Executive without any previous political training.

text: I have nothing to do with opinions. I deal only with armed rebellion and its aiders and abettors.

text: I appreciate the fact, and am proud of it, that the attentions I am receiving are intended more for our country than for me personally.

citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_392951

text: Declare Church and State forever separate and distinct, but each free within their proper spheres, and that all church property shall bear its own proportion of taxation.

citation: "Ulysses S. Grant Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/ulysses_s_grant_751636

text: I would suggest the taxation of all property equally, whether church or corporation, exempting only the last resting place of the dead and possibly, with proper restrictions, church edifices.
